price: Ɛneε wͻn mfa asεm bi a εte saa mmra sε wͻyε nokwafoͻ ampa a.
arabic: فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِحَدِيثٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: falyatū biḥadīthin mith'lihi in kānū ṣādiqīna
